ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: (This happens before Lunarpine hears the first explosion.) Now theres a response Lunarpine didn t expect, not only was she not mad at him, now she s kissing

(This happens before Lunarpine hears the first explosion.)
Now theres a response Lunarpine didn't expect, not only was she not 
mad at him, now she's kissing him. "I'll never understand shebots" 
Lunarpine thinks as he smiles, if this was a tactic to catch him off 
gaurd it worked. after what he pulled in the forest he half expected 
the kiss to be followed by one of her daggers at his throat.

For the first time since he'd met her he was speechless.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> ::Shadow Wing::
> 
> She looked at Lunarpine.  She wanted to tell him something, but 
> feared that this wasn't the right time. She smiled. "Uh, I was 
> wondering. Uh, would you mind if....." She knelt down and kissed 
him 
> on the side of his muzzle.  She stood up and walked on.  She had a 
> smile on her face that went from ear to ear.  She was proud of 
> herself.  She finally did what she had wanted to do.  And was show 
> him how her spark felt about him.
